content: knit these beautifully textured cowls using only one skein of bulky yarn and the gorgeous dot stitch these cowls work up quickly and would make beautiful gifts for yourself or loved ones two different sizes are available in this written pattern version 1 uses hue + me yarn and is looser around the neck while version 2 uses woolspun yarn and is closer to the neck the free knit pattern can be found *** here 1 *** if you are interested in using a different weight of yarn you can check out the ** dotty cowl 2 ** using worsted weight *** here 3 *** and the ** chunky dotty cowl 4 ** using super bulky level 6 yarn *** here 5 *** the matching bulky dotty beanie patterns will be posted next week note that the pdf for purchase contains all the dotty cowl patterns for worsted weight bulky and super bulky yarns 1 https //www allaboutami com/bulky-dotty-cowl/ 2 https //www allaboutami com/dotty-cowl/ 3 https //www allaboutami com/dotty-cowl/ 4 https //www allaboutami com/chunky-dotty-cowl/ 5 https //www allaboutami com/chunky-dotty-cowl/
